name: Squeaky Clean (itch)
description:
A short game made in 72 hours for the Mini Jam 84.

-[W A S D] to move

-[Space] to scrub the counter

The goal is to last as long as possible keeping the germs away from your beautiful counter. Bubbles from your scrubbing will instantly clean the germs as they fall. Once they hit the counter you have 2 seconds to clean them by scrubbing before they set in. Once 3 have set in you lose .
